resources.string:
Important Notice:
 Content downloaded from this app is purely for entertainment, educational purposes and personal use only. Content should not be used for professional use. We are not responsible any legal action from Intellectual Property holder
 Crash Log:
 If an app crashes we collect details of the crash. There won't be any personal pieces of information are collected.
But we collect link that you tried to download(you can turn it off from settings).

Sign-in:
 Some feature like Instagram private video download option requires sign-in. We won't collect user credentials rather we collect cookies and stored them in your device. In any case, we won't collect them. They are encrypted and store so they are secure.

Analytics:
 We use Google Analytics to analyze our users' experience. Crash also a part of Analytics. We don't collect any other details other than the crash log.

Ads:
 Ads are a huge support for developers. Revenue from ads encourages us. Don't vex we won't spam ads via notification. For every download, there will be a skippable ad(usually an image or short video). Small Ads at bottom.
Thanks for your interest to visit about section of this app.We are small group of student. Contact us via Social Contact
